EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.New Confirm - Manila
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Big Data Roadshow Manila
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 14, 2015 Discovery Primea Hotel
6749 Ayala Ave
Makati
1226 Metro Manila
Philippines {{my.Save the Date - Manila:default=edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow> in Manila.
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM - 9:30 AM The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
9:30 AM - 10:00 AM Keynote: Identifying The Real Value of your Data
10:00 AM - 10:30 AM Roundtable Discussion: The Real Business Value of your data
10:30 AM - 10:40 AM Break
10:40 PM - 11:10 AM Architecture Overview
11:10 PM - 11:30 AM Demo: Internet of things
11:30 AM - 1:00 PM Hands On Technical Workshops
1:00 PM - 2:00 PM Lunch VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow>
